transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Very very good afternoon.
Customer: Yes sir, tell me.
Executive: Sir, main Roshan baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke office se aapka manager.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya hun sir.
Executive: Aapki sir mail aayi hui thi usi ke regarding maine aapko call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan sir meri baat ho gayi hai sir se hai na, sir se baat ho gayi hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Sir wo leave pe the to call receive nahi ho rahi thi ab unhone bataya ki leave karun aur leads ka thoda sa wo ho raha tha flow hai na to maine fir unse baat ho gayi aaj morning me hui hai.
Executive: To ab ab theek hai sir?
Customer: Kaisa matlab?
Executive: Matlab baat ho gayi to are you satisfied with the resolution jo humne aapko provide kara.
Customer: Satisfied matlab hai aisa matlab maine jo mere sath jo ho raha tha matlab leads ka ya jo bhi tha wo maine unko bataya hua hai hai na.
Executive: To regarding wo unhone bola hai update karne ke liye jaisa jo bhi ho.
Executive: Akhtar ji ne mere se discuss kara hua tha.
Executive: Isiliye maine aapko call kara.
Executive: Hamare paas me do cheeze hain sir dekhiye lead kya hota hai na wo automatically aapke paas me aati hai right.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hamare paas me jo bhi valid rehta hai jo bhi hamara sources hai to verify that lead jaise mail ho gaya.
Executive: Ab to humne sources me whatsapp bhi integrate karna shuru kar diya hai ki bahut sari lead hum whatsapp pe reverify bhi karte hain.
Customer: Kai number aise hain sir jo leads aap keh rahe ho whatsapp ka but nahi hai whatsapp pe available nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main wahi maine bola na ki kuch humne integrate karna shuru kara hai abhi ye pura nahi hua hai humne ispe bhi start kara hua hai to mail pe verify hota hai call pe verify hoti hai.
Customer: Sorry sir for beech me aapko interrupt kar raha hun aapse meri baat hui thi.
Customer: To aapne bola tha ki hum logo ne yahan se verify ke liye ye cheez ki hui hai ki yahan se hum log whatsapp bhi check kar rahe hain hai na.
Customer: To fir abhi aap just bol rahe hain mere se aap se meri baat ho chuki hai pehle hai na abhi aap bol rahe hain ki abhi hum wo progress kar rahe hain abhi aap bol rahe the ki wo cheez ho chuki hai to ye jo cheez ho rahi hai ye kya hai iska.
Executive: Main batata hun hamara sara jaise man lijiye ki hamare paas me let suppose ki 1 lakh lead aati hai daily ka for example right.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Abhi aisa nahi hai ki 1 lakh ke 1 lakh lead me hum whatsapp pe verify kar rahe hain.
Executive: We have integrated whatsapp verification to abhi let suppose ki 20000 pe ho rahi thi pehle ab 30000 pe ho rahi hai to dheere dheere karke humne pure pe integrate karna shuru kara hua hai jahan pe bhi possibilities hai aisa maine kabhi nahi kaha ki sare ke sare lead whatsapp pe verify hote hain right.
Executive: Hamesha mail pe aur call pe verify hoti hai.
Customer: Ji bataye sir aap kuch bol rahe hain.
Customer: Sir main aapko thoda sa kya hai ki thoda sa lunch bhi ho gaya aur clients ka call aa raha hai main aapko free time me call karun.
Executive: Sir main sirf 10 minute lunga kyunki aapka na bar bar same hi concern hamare paas me aa raha hai.
Customer: Main aapko 10 minute se call karta hun thoda sa urgent call aa raha hai mere pe hai na free ho jaaun main aapko karta hun mujhe bhi thoda sa bahut doubt hai.
Executive: Main 3 baje connect karun aapko.
Customer: 3 baje nahi sir 3 baje nahi 3 baje demo fix hai mera thoda client ke sath hai na.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: To main jaise hi free hota hun main aapko contact karta hun.
Executive: Actually sir abhi lunch ka aap chalo koi nahi aap mujhe call karo.
Customer: Main aapko jaise hi free hota hun main khud karunga kyunki mujhe bhi aapko main whatsapp karta hun aapko main whatsapp kar raha hun aap please mujhe whatsapp pe reply kijiye aur jab bhi aap free honge na aap mujhe whatsapp pe dal dijiyega main aapko connect kar lunga.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had concerns regarding buyleads.

- Customer stated WhatsApp verification not available.

- Customer has doubts about the verification process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the lead verification process.

- Executive clarified WhatsApp integration is in progress.

- Executive offered to address concerns later.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact executive via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp, verification, integration
